title: Which English song are you listening to every day? - Quora

Cause this is All We Know! - by Chainsmokers feat. Phoebe Ryan! This song is currrently ruling my playlist like a boss . Its lyrics go as- LYRICS: Fighting flames of fireHang onto burning wiresWe don't care anymoreAre we fading lovers?We keep wasting colorsMaybe we should let this go We're falling apart, still we hold togetherWe've passed the end, so we chase forever'Cause this is all we knowThis feeling's all we know I'll ride my bike up to the roadDown the streets right through the cityI'll go everywhere you goFrom Chicago to the coastYou tell me, “Hit this and let's goBlow the smoke right through the window”'Cause this is all we know 'Cause this is all we know'Cause this is all we know Never face each otherOne bed, different coversWe don’t care anymoreTwo hearts still beatingOn with different rhythmsMaybe we should let this go We're falling apart, still we hold togetherWe've passed the end, so we chase forever'Cause this is all we knowThis feeling's all we know I'll ride my bike up to the roadDown the streets right through the cityI'll go everywhere you goFrom Chicago to the coastYou tell me, “Hit this and let's goBlow the smoke right through the window”'Cause this is all we know 'Cause this is all we know'Cause this is all we know Songwriters: Andrew Taggart / Sara Hjellstrom / Nirob Islam Here is a link to the video: The Chainsmokers - All We Know ft. Phoebe Ryan

I'm usually gravitated towards Heavy Metal and Hard Rock genres. But I respect all geners and musicians. Some of my favorite songs are : “Snuff” by slipknot.“Chop suey!” by system of a down.“Toxicity” by system of a down.“Knockin’ on heavens door” by GNR.“Sweet Child O’ mine” by GNR.“Waking a demon” by bullet for my valentine.“Tears don't fall” by bullet for my valentine.“Your betrayal” by bullet for my valentine.“I remember you” by skid row.“18 and life” by skid row.“Vermillion” by slipknot.“Time of your life” by Greenday.“Unforgiven 2″ by Metallica.“Nothing else matters” by Metallica.“Hesitate” by Stone sour.“Bother” by Stone sour.“Through glass” by stone sour.“In the end” by Linkin Park.“leave out all the rest” by Linkin Park.“black” by pearl jam.“photograph” by nickelback.“far away” by nickelback.“if today was your last day” by nickelback.“iris” by goo goo dolls.But if am asked to narrow it down to just one song that I definitely listen to everyday…it would be Iris by goo goo dolls.

See you Again -Wiz khalifa ft.Charlie puth I have been listening this song every single day . "See You Again" is a song recorded by American rapper Wiz Khalifa, featuring American singer Charlie Puth. The track was commissioned for the soundtrack of the 2015 action film Furious 7 as a tribute to the late Paul Walker, who died in a single-vehicle accident on November 30, 2013 in Valencia, California. It became the first hip-hop song to reach 2 billion views as well as being the second video ever to do so after Psy's "Gangnam Style". Wiz Khalifa - See You Again ft. Charlie Puth [Official Video] Furious 7 Soundtrack Source-wiki & YouTube

Katy Perry - Rise This song I am listening everyday and it is giving me goosebumps even after listening it numerous times. This song has beautiful lyrics and even the dead will rise after listening this amazing song.

INXS-Afterglow Here I am, lost in the light of the moon that comes through my windowBathed in blue, the walls of my memory divide the thorns from the rosesIt's you and the roses Touch me and I will follow in your afterglowHeal me from all this sorrowAs I let you go I will find my way when I see your eyesNow I'm living in your afterglow Here I am, lost in the ashes of time, but who wants tomorrow?In between the longing to hold you againI'm caught in your shadow, I'm losing controlMy mind drifts away, we only have today Touch me and I will follow in your afterglowHeal me from all this sorrowAs I let you go I will find my wayI will sacrifice 'til the blinding day when I see your eyesNow I'm living in your afterglow When the veils are gone as I let you go, as I let you go Touch me and I will follow in your afterglowHeal me from all this sorrowAs I let you go I will find my way, I will sacrificeNow I'm living in your afterglow Bathed in blue, the walls of my memory divide the thorns from the rosesIt's you who is closest Loving its Lyrics these days ; Awesome Indeed

‘A Thousand Years’ I usually wake up thinking of my hectic day ahead; classes to attend, labs, record writing etc and the stress really gets to me. So I turn on this song. My roommate and I absolutely love it. It soothes us like no other song does. The beautiful lyrics, the mesmerizing tune, the powerful voice…..this song is literally perfect!!!! It absolutely radiates good vibes. A tranquil atmosphere is all you need to get a good start :)

Closer, Treat you better, cheap thrills, perfect strangers In love with the music of closer n cheap thrills, in love with the lyrics of treat you better and perfect strangers <3 This is my repeat playlist for English. I am so weird in music tastes. Starting from shamshad begum, diljeet amrinder Gill (Punjabi) to Sia and Chainsmokers and even Enrique (Spanish songs too) I can be found listening to all this variety even in a day :p

Alive - Sia. Whenever I'm melancholy or in a pensive mood,I put on my headphones,close my eyes and play this song at full volume. 4 minutes 58 seconds later I'm a changed person,high on confidence and adrenaline. And surprisingly I do this once a day,everyday.

Daily I listen to many English songs and it keeps on changing as new one are released, these days I’m crazy about : “ Why not me" by Enrich Ingleias “ Hand on " by Ananya Birla #Some all time favorites songs are: 1)What makes you beautiful by one direction 2)Rockybye by shirley setia 3) Hall of fame by The script 4)Cheap Thrills by Sia. 5) Where do broken hearts go by One direction I feel this songs from heart. It makes me feel happy..... I love lyrics of all this songs.... Thanking you....

Black flies on the windowsillThat we areThat we areThat we are to knowWinter stole summer's thrillAnd the river's cracked and cold See the sky is no man's landA darkened plume to stayHope here needs a humble handNot a fox found in your place And no man is an island, oh this I knowBut can't you see, oh?Maybe you were the ocean, when I was just a stone Black flies on the windowsillThat we areThat we areThat we are to holdComfort came against my willAnd every story must grow old Still I'll be a travelerA gypsy's reins to faceBut the road is wearierWith that fool found in your place And no man is an island, oh this I knowBut can't you see, oh?Maybe you were the ocean, when I was just a stone[x2] So here we are... Hi there, Here are few songs I have been listening to now a days a alot. Enjoy :) “Love is Strange” by Buddy Holly.  “There Goes My Baby” by Enrique Iglesias.  “Night changes” by One Direction.  “When you say nothing at all” by Ronan Keating.

Recently I got a random recommendation by YouTube. It's Saturn - Sleeping at last. I'm in love with it's music and lyrics. So beautiful and motivating : You taught me the courage of stars before you left. How light carries on endlessly, even after death. With shortness of breath, you explained the infinite. How rare and beautiful it is to even exist. I couldn’t help but ask For you to say it all again. I tried to write it down But I could never find a pen. I’d give anything to hear You say it one more time, That the universe was made Just to be seen by my eyes. I couldn’t help but ask For you to say it all again. I tried to write it down But I could never find a pen. I’d give anything to hear You say it one more time, That the universe was made Just to be seen by my eyes. With shortness of breath, I’ll explain the infinite How rare and beautiful it truly is that we exist. Recommended *

When you were standing in the wake of devastationWhen you were waiting on the edge of the unknownAnd with the cataclysm raining downInsides crying, "Save me now!"You were there, impossibly alone Do you feel cold and lost in desperation?You build up hope, but failure’s all you’ve knownRemember all the sadness and frustrationAnd let it go. Let it go And in a burst of light that blinded every angelAs if the sky had blown the heavens into starsYou felt the gravity of tempered graceFalling into empty spaceNo one there to catch you in their arms Do you feel cold and lost in desperation?You build up hope, but failure’s all you’ve knownRemember all the sadness and frustrationAnd let it go. None actually. I get bored if I listen to a particular song daily. Recently, I got bored of the song Closer (Chainsmokers) too! Seriously some songs are so amazing that you keep on playing them on repeat till the time you get hell bored. Closer is one of those songs for me :P ( P.S.- Thank you for the answer request :) )

You know- This song has taken control of my mind like anything! I’m in Innocent by Taylor Swift (Speak now) This song has exceptional lyrics with deep meanings and yeah! Taylor’s voice is so awesome?!?! What say?
The song which I am listening (or watching too) everyday would be the song “While my guitar gently weeps”(Rock and Roll Hall Of Fame version).I should say that i love this song because of the Prince.

Right now the song I am listening to the Beethoven’s Ninth Symphony , 2nd Movement, everyday  This composition is the one which I cannot stop humming to right now. It has been on my mind for the last few days and I cannot get enough of it.
Taylor Swift’s Shake It Off! This song is on loop. It keeps me motivated. Keeps reminding to be myself. “Haters gonna hate, fakers gonna fake, I’m just gonna shake it off”

Let Her Go… (Passenger) "Let Her Go" was released in July 2012 as the second single from Passenger's third album All the Little Lights. Bridge over Troubled Waters .. Simon and Garfunkel. I love the almost operatic swell of music before “Sail on, silver girl”. And there's Roberta Flack's “Killing me softly”.
